title: 2025 / 26 Newcastle United home kit - Prices revealed as now goes on sale
body_text:
2025/26 Newcastle United home kit – Prices revealed as now goes on sale
The 2025/26 Newcastle United home kit has now gone on sale.
Last week we reported (see below) that next season’s home kit would go on sale this Thursday (29 May) morning.
The team having then worn the 2025/26 Newcastle United home kit on Sunday.
Not the best of debuts for this kit, as United lost 1-0 to Everton.
In happier news though, events elsewhere led to a fifth place finish and guaranteed Champions League football.
With the club having now put the 2025/26 Newcastle United home kit on sale, we can see what the prices are that are now charged for the new replica strips…
Adults
Shirt £85 (longsleeved is £90, whilst the ‘authentic’ as worn by the players is £120)
Shorts £38
Socks £20
Full replica 2025/26 Newcastle United home kit is £143 for adults
Kids
Shirt £55
Shorts £30
Socks £20
Full replica 2025/26 Newcastle United home kit is £105 for kids
Go HERE to visit the club’s official online shop.
The Mag report – 23 May 2025:
In early May 2025, we brought you what were claimed to be some leaked images (see below) of the 2025/26 Newcastle United Home Shirt, that were circulating online.
Now on Friday morning (23 May 2025) there has been the official launch.
Both Adidas and the club revealing the new 2025/26 Newcastle United Home Shirt.
With the players set to wear the new kit on Sunday against Everton.
Then it will go on sale to fans from 9am on Thursday 29 May.
As you can see, those claimed leaked images of the 2025/26 Newcastle United Home Shirt have proved to be spot on.
Great to see Alexander Isak in the new kit, looking forward to seeing him wear it on Sunday and next season…
The Mag article – 7 May 2025:
Amongst the many important dates that lie ahead for fans, the release of the 2025/26 Newcastle United Home Shirt is one of those moments eagerly awaited.
Newcastle United supporters very keen to see what Adidas deliver for next season.
Then even more importantly, get their hands on the new 2025/26 Newcastle United Home Shirt.
No date as yet for when next season’s home shirt will be launched.
In the past, we saw at times the players wear the following season’s home shirt in the final St James’ Park match of the preceding season.
Around this time of year, it has become the norm for ‘leaked’ images to appear online, ahead of the official shirt launches.
That moment appears to have arrived, with these image below of the ‘leaked’ 2025/26 Newcastle United home shirt now circulating online.
As to whether these are showing the real thing for next season? Who knows.
However, I think every chance that this will turn out to be the 2025/26 Newcastle United home shirt.
…and the back
Last year, the 2024/25 Newcastle United home shirt went on sale on Friday 7 June 2024 and that date was made public some time before it went on sale.
I am guessing that in the very near future we will get the date for when next season’s NUFC home shirt will be going on sale, whether it is this ‘leaked’ design or not.
If you would like to feature on The Mag, submit your article to contribute@themag.co.uk
